reviews.review: The story is great and the puzzles are replayable. The speedrun strategy is also fun to learn and not insanely crazy to pull off with youtube videos. The best dialogue in any game I will say
one of the greatest of all time

I've just finished playing this game for the third time at least (some hours are not on record) and it still feels great. That sense of escape, the atmosphere between the test chambers, the jokes and the music, every little corner of Portal 2 is just so well made. 
Definetely worth playing it and not only once :)

Classic game, I always enjoy the jokes. When life gives you lemons, burn crap with the lemons!

The most incredible and beautiful game I have ever played! This game and the first one are a story so simple yet so engaging which is funny because the main character in this game doesn't have one line of dialogue. It is one of the most brilliant FPS/puzzle games ever. Not to say just how incredibly funny this game is it will have you laughing from the first words in the game. The game is also huge! It never really ends because after you are done the single player story mode, there is still a co-op mode, and after you are done that you can play custom levels designed by the community and even create your own!

Overall: This is my favourite game ever 100/10

I don't play games for the graphics, but damn, this game is beautiful. My favourite character is Wheatley, [spoiler] before he turns evil, that is [/spoiler], because he is funny and has the best aditude. Also, the portal puzzles are pretty fun and keeps my mind working. That's important too.
